itemsV2.name: Tomato, Beefsteak, Sold in singles, 0.23 - 0.39 kg
itemsV2.shortDescription: Beefsteak tomatoes, the crowned jewels of the tomato world, are a true delight for tomato enthusiasts. With their impressive size and juicy flesh, they offer a burst of flavour in every bite. These versatile tomatoes are perfect for slicing and layering in sandwiches or topping burgers, adding a savoury and tangy element to your dishes. Their robust taste also shines when roasted, grilled, or turned into rich sauces. Packed with essential nutrients like vitamin C and lycopene, beefsteak tomatoes not only elevate the taste of your meals but also contribute to your nourishment. Experience the savoury allure of beefsteak tomatoes, enhancing your culinary creations with their unmatched taste and versatility.

itemsV2.name: Asparagus, Sold in bunches, 0.42 - 0.53 kg
itemsV2.shortDescription: Asparagus, versatile and nutritious, is best known for its delicate stalk and unique flavour. Whether roasted, steamed, grilled, or sauteed, it offers a delicious and distinct taste that pairs nicely with variety of dishes. This nutrient-rich vegetable is high in fibre, potassium, and vitamin C and B. With its lively green colour with hints of purple and a great texture, asparagus is not only tasty but also a visually appealing ingredient that adds a pop of colour to any dish. Its short growing season from April to June makes local asparagus a favourite during the spring and summer months.

itemsV2.name: Shanghai Bok Choy, 340 g
itemsV2.shortDescription:

to pick the best and freshest products to meet your expectations. Satisfaction guaranteed* or your money back!

itemsV2.name: Green Onion, Sold in bunches
itemsV2.shortDescription: Green onions, a vibrant and versatile vegetable, brings a fresh and mild onion flavour to your dishes. With their long, green stalks and small white bulbs, they add a delightful touch to various cuisines. Whether used as a garnish, sautéed in stir-fries, or incorporated into soups, green onions offer a burst of colour and taste. Their crisp texture and subtle onion taste complement a wide range of recipes. As a source of vitamins and antioxidants, green onions contribute to both taste and health. Embrace the culinary charm of green onions, enhancing your dishes with their vibrant and flavorful essence.

itemsV2.name: Sweet Onions, 3 lb
itemsV2.shortDescription: Sweet onion are a delectable addition to any kitchen. With their golden-brown skin and succulent white flesh, they offer a milder and sweeter taste compared to regular onions. Savour them raw in salads, grilled to perfection, or sautéed in savoury dishes. Their natural sweetness enhances the flavours of various cuisines, making them a versatile and sought-after ingredient. Packed with essential nutrients and antioxidants, sweet onions not only elevate the taste but also contribute to a nutritious diet. Embrace the aromatic charm and delicate sweetness of sweet onions, creating culinary masterpieces that leave taste buds longing for more.

itemsV2.name: Onion, Yellow, Sold in singles, 0.15 - 0.43 kg
itemsV2.shortDescription: Yellow onions, a staple in kitchens across Canada, are a versatile and flavorful ingredient. With its yellow skin and white flesh, this strong and slightly sweet onion variety adds depth and complexity to a wide range of dishes. Whether chopped, sliced, or diced, the yellow onion brings a boost of flavour that can help elevate any recipe. They are also known for their ability to caramelize beautifully, releasing a sweet aroma and adding a savory element to soups, stews, stir-fries, or sautés. Their versatility, rich flavour, and year-round availability makes yellow onions a kitchen essential.

itemsV2.name: Sunset Rainbow Bell Peppers, 3ct, Pack of 3, colours may vary
itemsV2.shortDescription: Bell peppers are versatile vegetables that add a delightful crunch and burst of flavour to various dishes. With their glossy, bell-shaped exteriors and crisp, juicy flesh, they are a treat for the senses. Whether raw in salads, sautéed in stir-fries, stuffed, or roasted, bell peppers bring a unique and pleasant taste to the table. Packed with vitamins, antioxidants, and dietary fibre, bell peppers not only enhance the culinary experience but also contribute to a nutritious diet. Embrace the versatility of bell peppers in your cooking and enjoy the delightful texture and flavour they bring to your meals.

itemsV2.name: Celery, Sold in bunches
itemsV2.shortDescription: Celery, with its crisp texture and refreshing taste, is a versatile and nutritious vegetable that adds a delightful crunch to various dishes. One of celery's distinct characteristics is its crispness, which makes it a popular choice for dipping into sauces, spreads, or dressings. It is often included in salads for its satisfying crunch and mild flavor that complements a range of other ingredients. Low in calories, celery is not only hydrating but also packed with nutrients such as folate and vitamin K. Celery can be enjoyed on its own or as a flavour-enhancing ingredient that adds a refreshing and nutritious element to any one of your meals.

Enjoyed fresh from the cob or as a versatile ingredient, it adds a delightful touch to countless recipes. Packed with vitamins, minerals, and dietary fibre, sweet corn not only pleases the palate but also contributes to a nourishing diet. Embrace the seasonal charm of sweet corn, savouring its delightful essence during the sunny summer months.

New CopyBlock Module, Tuesday, January 24, 2023, 7:52:48:81 pm

copyBlock.cwc:
Buy all your fresh vegetables online through Walmart Grocery

Make grocery shopping more convenient, buy vegetables from Walmart.ca. Instead of trekking to the store to buy vegetables, order everything you need online and pick it up when you're ready. Our online selection includes everything you usually find in-store, and you can search for just the things you need through easy navigation of our website. Save time by ticking items off your list as you add them to your online cart. Additionally, while you shop vegetables and fruit, you can also pick out things you might forget on regular shopping trips like laundry detergent and dental care products. As always, when you shop vegetables at Walmart Canada, you get high-quality food at everyday low prices that help you stretch your grocery budget further.

Fresh vegetables can brighten up your next snack or meal

Shop vegetables online to make snacks or meals more colourful and delicious. Whether you want salad staples like lettuce, tomatoes and red onions, cookout essentials such as corn on the cob, sweet peppers and asparagus or ingredients for tasty dishes like cabbage rolls, vegetable soup or stir-fry, Walmart Canada has you covered with a colourful selection of vegetables online. Choose pre-packaged bags of snap peas and Brussels sprouts that let you steam them in your microwave for quick sides, or shop vegetables sold as loose singles or bunches to get the right amount for your favourite recipes. Buy vegetables like zucchini and butternut squash in season to add colour and flavour to autumn meals, or select big bags of potatoes to help you stock up for the winter.

Order online. Choose pickup at checkout. Get your vegetables when it's convenient for you

Spend more time with your family and less time shopping for groceries by using Walmart.ca's fruit and vegetables grocery pickup service. Shop at your leisure from home or work, add meats and snacks that complement the vegetables you pick to your online cart, then choose pickup options that suit your schedule when you check out. You can also add pet supplies like big bags of dog food or large pails of cat litter to your order to let someone else do the heavy lifting. 

Modern life requires balancing work with family time, and Walmart Canada makes this balance a bit easier to achieve by perusing the aisles and picking out top-notch groceries for you. Our fruit and vegetables grocery delivery service takes your weekly shopping to the next level by bringing fresh, tasty goods directly to your door for an even more convenient way to shop for essentials.
